mdRecord.dcterms:description: Mostly legible, unattributed lines from song "Round Here," by Counting Crows; with response. Dates. [work]
Student graffiti art and messages inscribed on carrel walls in the new stacks, Alderman Library, University of Virginia, prior to the renovation of the building, 2020-2023. [host]
edge of where the ocean meets the land, just like she's walkin' on a wire in the circus | Counting Crows rock | 10-14-14 | Fall 2016
